summary: 2002 VOLKSWAGEN  PASSAT, WAGON, 4 CYL 2.0 L MOTOR.  I  HAD 2 OCCASIONS WHERE THE WIRING HARNESS  SHORTED OUT ON THE FRONT HEADLIGHTS, ONCE ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE AT 75,000 MILES, AND ONCE ON THE PASSENGER'S  SIDE AT 40,000 MILES.  THERE WAS NO FIRE, BUT IN BOTH INCIDENTS THE WIRES HAD COMPLETELY MELTED TO THE WIRING HARNESS WHERE THE HEADLIGHTS WERE ATTACHED.  THE WIRES WERE COMPLETELY EXPOSED IN BOTH INCIDENTS.   *AK
